title: Notification of Sexual Violence Policies and Supportive Measure in K-20 Education
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Notification of Sexual Violence Policies and Supportive Measure in K-20 Education;  Requires public & private K-20 educational institutions to have sexual violence policies; authorizes such educational institutions to have supportive measures; provides requirements for such policies & measures; requires schools to notify students, parents, school staff, & school volunteers of such policies & measures; & provides requirements for such notifications.
